text: In France, the concours Advance is a test to access four main engineering colleges:Concours Advance : mode d’emploi * École pour l'informatique et les techniques avancées for computer science and software engineering ; * École spéciale de mécanique et électricité for energy ; * Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées for aeronautical and aerospace engineering. * Sup'Biotech for biotechnology. The test has been created in 2011 by IONIS Education Group.Le Concours Advance 2015 est ouvert == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Engineering schools Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:2011 establishments in France
title: Concours Advance
